item.title: Dynamics 365 Finance Operations upgrade questionaire
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive questionnaire for assessing AX 2012 to Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations upgrade projects including organization structure and customizations analysis.

item.title: Dynamics 365 finance and operations ODATA consuming - Length cannot be less than zero
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving ‘Length cannot be less than zero’ error when consuming OData services from Dynamics 365 Finance Operations in .NET applications.

item.title: Enable Power BI Embedded in cloud hosted Dynamics 365 finance and operations 8.0 +
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step guide for enabling Power BI Embedded integration in cloud-hosted Dynamics 365 Finance Operations 8.0+ environments including workspace configuration.

item.title: Consuming Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide for consuming D365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET applications including authentication, service principal setup, and C# implementation.

item.title: Business events and HTTPs endpoint
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to setting up Business Events with HTTPS endpoints in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations using Azure Functions, AAD app registration, and Key Vault for secure webhook integration.

item.title: Insert multiple records in a single transaction using Odata from Postman
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to insert multiple records in a single OData batch request using Postman for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations integration.

item.title: Handle AIF error messages in dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide for handling and managing AIF error messages in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 integration scenarios with practical troubleshooting techniques.

item.title: AIF Custom response value in Dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to customize AIF response values in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 for sales order creation using C# integration and EntityKeyList handling.

item.title: CRUD Purchase Requisition using AIF in Dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete walkthrough for implementing purchase requisition create, read, update, and delete operations using AIF integration in Dynamics AX 2012 R3.

item.title: CRUD Purchase order using AIF in Dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to implementing purchase order CRUD operations using AIF document services in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 with C# code examples.

item.title: Insert, update, Delete order line through AIF In AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to perform CRUD operations on order lines through AIF integration services in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 with detailed implementation examples.

item.title: CRUD Items, products, products master dimension, variants using AIF in Dynamics AX 2012 R3
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete tutorial on creating, reading, updating, and deleting products and variants in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 using AIF services and C# integration.
